snippet: CLARK--Jacob, age 92 of White Plains, NY passed away Wednesday, April 13, 2016 at his home. Jacob was a devoted husband, loving father, grandfather and great-grandfather leaving behind his wife Rita Clark, four children Jane, Amy, Steven and David, seven grandchildren Peter, Heather, Sarah, Daniel, Katelyn, Ethan and Sophia and two great-grandchildren Thadius and Avery. Funeral service will be held on Friday at 10am at the Ballard-Durand Funeral Home, 2 Maple Avenue at South Broadway, White Plains, NY. 1/3
